Text: RE DRAFT LETTER TO RICKEY WADDELL Cc Looks fine Original Message From Pierce Shelly Sent Tuesday December PM To Cash Michelle Cc Rath Mikie Walton Sheila Subject DRAFT LETTER TO RICKEY WADDELL Michelle As discussed attached for your review is a draft letter to Rickey Waddell Could you please review and let me know of any changes that are needed so that we can mail to the employee as soon as possible Thank you Michelle Shelly X Mikie Could you please review also from a benefits perspective File Rick Waddelldoc
